sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useParams, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import '../components/PurchaseRequest.css'; const ViewForm = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [form, setForm] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { fetchForm(); // eslint-disable-next-line }, []); const fetchForm = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(`http://192.168.17.15:5000/api/forms`); const foundForm = response.data.find(f => f.id === parseInt(id)); if (foundForm) { setForm(foundForm); } else { alert("ไม่พบข้อมูลฟอร์ม"); } } catch (error) { console.error("❌ Error fetching form:", error); } }; const handleBack = () => { navigate('/'); }; const handleDownloadPDF = () => { window.open(`http://192.168.17.15:5000/api/forms/${id}/pdf`, '_blank'); }; if (!form) return

🔄 กำลังโหลดข้อมูล...

; let detailsObj = {}; try { detailsObj = JSON.parse(form.details); } catch (err) { console.error("❌ Error parsing details JSON:", err); } const { name, department, date, deliveryDate, items = [], remarks, vendorName, vendorAddress1, vendorAddress2, vendorZip, currency, terms, supervisorEmail, depManagerComment, gmComment, signRequester, dateRequester, signDepartmentManager, dateDepartmentManager, signGeneralManager, dateGeneralManager, subTotal, vat, grandTotal } = detailsObj; // แปลงตัวเลขให้อยู่ในรูปแบบ xx,xxx.xx const subTotalStr = (subTotal || 0).toLocaleString('en-US', { minimumFractionDigits: 2 }); const vatStr = (vat || 0).toLocaleString('en-US', { minimumFractionDigits: 2 }); const grandTotalStr = (grandTotal || 0).toLocaleString('en-US', { minimumFractionDigits: 2 }); return (

Newly Weds Foods (Thailand) Limited

General Purchase Requisition

Form Details: {form.form_name}

{/* Row 1: Name, Dept, Date */}
{name} {department}
{/* Row 2: Manager Email, Delivery Date */}
{supervisorEmail}
{date}
{deliveryDate}
{/* ตาราง Items */} {items.map((row, index) => ( ))}
ITEM Description Unit Quantity Cost Amount
{index + 1} {row.description} {row.unit} {row.quantity} {row.cost} {parseFloat(row.amount || 0).toLocaleString('en-US', { minimumFractionDigits: 2 })}
{/* Remarks */}
{remarks}
{/* main-row => Vendor Info + Summary */}

Vendor Info

{vendorName}
{vendorAddress1}
{vendorAddress2}
{vendorZip}
{currency} {terms}

Sub Total: {subTotalStr} {currency}

VAT (7%): {vatStr} {currency}

Grand Total: {grandTotalStr} {currency}

Comment by Department Manager

{depManagerComment}

Comment by General Manager

{gmComment}
Requester Department Manager General Manager
{signRequester}
{dateRequester}
{signDepartmentManager}
{dateDepartmentManager}
{signGeneralManager}
{dateGeneralManager}
); }; export default ViewForm;
